name: Fire Rocket
effect: While you have a Digimon with [Armor Form] in its traits in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements.[Main] 1 of your Digimon with 2 or more colors gains ＜Security Attack +1＞ for the turn. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
security_effect: [Security] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with ＜Blocker＞.
